extendedInfo.description: Anytime! From Anywhere! To Everywhere!File Sharing only with a 6 digit number!File Sharing Innovation created by Send Anywhere.From Android to Android / iPhone / iPad / PCFrom Android / iPhone / iPad / PC to AndroidYou can quickly and easily share any folders or files (include photos, videos, and Apps).â Simple UIÂ â No need to log-in or sign up to useâ File sharing among Android, iPhone, PC (Browser)â No file format limited to shareãHow to use Send Anywhereã -Sending file 1. Select a file(Document, Photo, Video, App etc.) and click a âSendâ  2. Get a 6 digit OTK(One Time Key) and send it to your friend 3. Sending finish Tip. Files can be sent to surrounding devices through Auto browsing function-Receiving file 1. Enter the 6 digit OTK in receiverâs device 2. Receiving finish Tip. Access files in your PC from Send Anywhere website www.send-web.comÂ â Real Send Anywhere usersâ tips â1. Sharing original photo ! a. Open Send Anywhere and click a âSendâ b. Click Photo among File Type c. Select photos and click OK (maximum 10 photos at once in Free Version) d. Send a 6 digit OTK or QR code to friend  e. The original photos will download in friendâs photo library2. Sharing App !  a. Open Send Anywhere and click a âSendâ  b. Click App among File Type c. Choose a App and click OK  d. Send a 6 digit OTK to friend e. The App will be installed in friendâs device without searching or downloading through App Store3. Add Friendâs contact information in your device! a. Open Send Anywhere and click a âReceiveâ  b. Enter a 6 digit OTK (which youâve got from your friend) c. The friendâs address will save in your address book automatically!Permission List:* android.permission.CAMERA- To scan QR code.* android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION- To find another devices near current location.* android.permission.INTERNET- To send/receive files.* android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS- To save the received contacts.* android.permission.READ_CONTACTS- To read contacts, when pick and send contacts.* android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE- To write received files on sdcard.* android.permission.WAKE_LOCK- So that the device can be sent/received in background without stopping when phone goes to sleep.* android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE- To check the connectivity status (wifi/mobile network).* android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE- To check the wifi status.* android.permission.READ_PROFILE- To get the name of account.* android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS- To access push account.* com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEIVE- To use push notification.Keywords: share file, file transfer, transfer wifi/3g

reviews.title: Nice one sure..
reviews.comment: I would recommend for sure to my frens. Good one.. I wish file expiry date could be extended to min fr a period of atleast 4-5days
reviews.author: mv srinivas

reviews.title: User friendly , note worthy, love it
reviews.comment: This realli is the best experiences I\'ve had on the play store I would recommend I\'ve looked up and down for an app to move my files from my htc to my iPhone hands down the best
reviews.author: Keyahna Hobbs

reviews.title: Super

reviews.title: More than 5 stars
reviews.comment: First time transfer from samsung to iphone. Thanks a lot. God bless you guys.
reviews.author: Ali S. Eren

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Nyc app. Sends multiple files easily. Even u can download using it on ur phone. Videos,  songs, documents etc. A must have app for net savvy people on android
reviews.author: DEEPAK DASH

reviews.title: Good, though
reviews.comment: It\'s very inconvenient to make so many operations before entering pair code. You made notification about incoming file, but it is not automatically pops up, the receiver must push it force mode!? The cursor must be put already to the input key field after receiving notification in status bar - and input code right away instead of pressing RECEIVE button, then put cursor, then put code. All those extra senseless manipulations irritate badly. Won\'t buy pro version until relative updates follow. You make it too complicated instead of making things easier. And yet you charge customers for the ad-free version. It\'s an absolute shame. Still one star
reviews.author: Any a

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Works excellence transfering pictures and documents to my ipad mini. Anyways u cant saves any songs on ipad. U still need a computers.
reviews.author: Yuzman Azua

reviews.comment: doesn\'t let you set received file path.gives error dir does not exist....\tI could not use it  bc it will not let me change received file path to point to mnt/extsd/dir gives error - dir cannot be created. I never asked the app to mkdir for me I did that already .sorry uninstalled.
reviews.author: Jason Reeves

reviews.title: Ipad and galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Why wont it let me save the songs I send from my cell phone on to my iPad?
reviews.author: khriz rodriguez

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app works great. Anyone who doesn\'t have Google Play on their tablet can transfer files with no hassle.
reviews.author: Ray Anderson

reviews.title: Great app fast accurate and on point. Just what I needed.
reviews.comment: This is a very good app it\'s just what I needed to transfer my music from my HTC to my GALAXY S3. No more confusing Bluetooth or wifi transfer crap that doesn\'t even come close to how great this app is. Just wish I could put recieved files onto external sdcard instead of internal memory.  Hands down the best app for sending and receiving files, apps, music whatever ever conceived.
reviews.author: giuseppe iacono
